titleStmt.title: The last advice of Mr. Ben. Alexander (late minister of West-Markham, in the county of Nottingham) to his children. In two parts. The contents follow.
titleStmt.author: Alexander, Ben. (Benjamin)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nath. Ekins, at the Gun in S. Pauls Churchyard.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral.

place.placeName: the Gun in S. Pauls Churchyard.
